name: brown and spotted rattle block
description:
a brown and spotted rattle like a brown and spotted cow

only better for general baby noise making stacking , turning and tipping

a simply, modern take on an ever classic gift for the little ones

a great baby shower gift and toddler developmental toy

*also available in sets of  3 and 6 blocks

brown and spotted rattle block measures 2 by 2 inches

handmade with beautifully grained, native and sustainably-harvested butternut and maple hardwood

name: pure geometry
description:
the hive and the honey comb 
in every classroom, nature speaks 
the study of geometry and form  

simple, modern candle light 
in ever changing natural geometry

sold in sets of  3, 6 or 9

hand-crafted cherry candle holders 
of native, sustainably-harvested hardwood 
with hand-poured, pure beeswax tea light candles

each tea light holder 
measures 3 by 3 inches.

name: urban prairie knives
description:
a modern take on the for the butter knife  for home, table and  entertaining. a well balanced and finely honed wooden spreader /knives

carefully handcrafted using native, sustainably-harvested 
hardwoods (maple, cherry, walnut)

includes set of three knifes:

- subdued red
- teal water blue
- lichen green 

* also available with cutting board

knifes measures approximately 7 inches long

each cutting edge is finely honed 
finished with shop made pure beeswax polish

* also sold in set of three with cutting board and single knife (color of choice) and small cutting board

options.name: set of three knives and board

name: windswept table
description:
when hardly a leaf is stirring on the trees 
and autumn has set them all nearly free.
they have blown here...

nature-inspired candle light holders
handcrafted sets in native and sustainably-harvested maple 
with hand-poured pure beeswax tea lights.

set of 3 includes :

-sugar maple leaf 
approximately 7 inches by 5 inches

-double oak leaf 
approximately 7 1/2 inches by 5 inches

-red maple leaf 
approximately 6 inches by 3 1/2 inches

hand finished with shop-made blend of pure beeswax wood polish
non toxic and petroleum free

FEATURED IN:  
Country Living Magazine / Rachel DeSchepper, web editor
